Modules
=============================================================
.. _my-reference-label:

Diffusion
---------------------------------------------------------------

2D_Qspace/CHARMED (e.g. AxCaliber, Time-dependence)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

3D_Qspace/DTI
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
3D_Qspace/NODDI
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

FieldMaps/B0_DEM (Dual-echo method)
-----------------------------------------------------------

FieldMaps/B1_DAM (Dual-angle method)
-----------------------------------------------------------

Myelin Imaging/MTSAT (Magnetization Transfer with T1 compensation)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Myelin Imaging/MWF (Myelin Water Fraction from T2)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Myelin Imaging/qMT/SIRFSE
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
(Quantitative Magnetization Transfer using FSE)

Myelin Imaging/qMT/SPGR
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
(Quantitative Magnetization Transfer using Spoiled-Gradient-Echo)


Myelin Imaging/qMT/bSSFP
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(Quantitative Magnetization Transfer using balanced SSFP)


Noise/NoiseLevel (Used in qMR methods to avoid signal bias)
-----------------------------------------------------------

T1 Mapping/InversionRecovery
-----------------------------------------------------------

T1 Mapping/VFA_T1 (Variable Flip Angle method)
-----------------------------------------------------------
